website_summaries.verdict: Deliver coffee on demand that stays hot and travels easier than other models.
pros: Sized right for catering professionals and event planners who need a portable device that can deliver hot beverages quickly
We love the grip handles for easy transportation as well
More sophisticated than other models in terms of heating technology
cons: While light to lift, the overall construction would benefit from heavier materials

website_summaries.verdict: Durable construction, lots of features, and a budget-friendly price tag earn the Hamilton Beach our pick for the best value available.
pros: A trusted brand and a reliable product
Offers cup-per-45 seconds of coffee brewing (though some users say it's more like a minute)
Streamlined design with large handles for easy carrying
cons: Is somewhat noisy when brewing, but the value it offers outweighs this small concern for most consumers

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT SERVE IN STYROFOAM CUPS
customer_reviews.text: I had about 30 people in my home and used the Hamilton Beach station for the first time to serve coffee. I shouldn't have used styrofoam cups. My guests kept complaining to me that it was difficult to press the dispenser with the cup and if they used their fingers, they would burn themselves! I had to have a glass mug to dispense the coffee and then serve from mug to styrofoam cups. The coffeemaker did brew great coffee and it did maintain its temperature but the one-hand feature is not practical if you can't use styrofoam cups.

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 40540 Brew Station 40-Cup Coffee Urn, Silver,Medium
product_meta.description: The Hamilton Beach BrewStation 40 Cup urn offers one-hand dispensing, so there is no need to put down a buffet or party plate to fill up a cup of coffee. In a busy buffet line, that means cups can be filled faster, saving time and reducing crowding. Disposable cups are never a problem, either - the dispensing button was designed to work with foam as well as classic ceramic cups. For added convenience, the dispensing area has a higher cup clearance than most urns and the drip tray removes for easy cleaning. The last drops of a 40-cup coffee urn have rarely tasted as good until now. In the BrewStation urn, a powerful center heater brews the entire tank quickly (45 seconds per cup versus the normal 60 seconds). Once brewed, the center heater shuts down and a gentle, keep-warm heater maintains a perfect temperature without scorching the coffee. Coffee tastes great longer, from the first cup to the last.
feature_bullets: One-hand dispensing. Coffee filter basket lifts out for easy dishwasher cleanup - no paper filter needed
Dual heater system maintains coffee's temperature without overcooking it for a fresher flavor
